channel.title: Pk Server/Stable/Domain/Needs one more coder/gfx to help us
channel.description:
[center] [size=18pt]CorruptedPkz[/size] [URL=http://"http://corruptedpkz.org/cForum/index.php"]Development Site[/URL] Looking For two server coders (1/3) that are new to java or if you are experienced and want to deal with noobs like me you can. Website Designer (already purchased quantum-focus.net for the site [using godaddy]) (1/1) who has a good amount of experience. Gfx designer (0/2) Ingame Administrators and Moderators (3/6) still need a head moderator and 2 normal mods. I am beast(head administrator) mod rune(administrator) Official Video Maker(0/1) Official Advertisers(0/3) will receive donor status also other advantages Proof of dev
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2m60jkj.png[/img]
Server Features
QFP Shops - you earn QFP from various things you do on the server. Full summoning BoB no more dupes 100% duel arena Admins cannot fight in wild to prevent them from losing spawned items. large amount of bosses will be shown in server media section. All potions including overloads and extremes. server consists of many bosses godwars, kbd, dagannoth kings, Chaos Elemental, Corp Beast, Desert strykeworm, Jungle strykeworm, Ice strykeworm, Jungle demon
Client Features
loads 640 items 500+ interfaces and models
Server media
[center][size=18pt]Quantum Focus Summoning[/size] [quote][IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/10fdppd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/v8e8g4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/wl90k3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2l8ge1c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/142uazr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/ajp3is.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/4ioqya.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/v7r4up.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2w3aj9h.png[/img][/quote] [size=18pt]Quantum Focus Mini Games[/size] Warriors Guild [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2zjl1e1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/10x7qs2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/5wxjqf.png[/img] Pest Control [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/23hkhg5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/eeszb.png[/img] Duel Arena [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/4h4e20.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2cy35p1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2pte9ok.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/i4k9cj.png[/img] [size=18pt]Quantum Focus Items[/size] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/9srvkp.png[/img] [size=18pt]Quantum Focus Bosses[/size] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/6jcydz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/dd7aw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2v93m75.png[/img] [/center]
Client media
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/hx2e54.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/rcvomu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2r44m8m.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2gtsrw8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/98u3ap.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/25qt3f5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2cgbwj6.png[/img]
Applications Website Designer
Name Age Experience: Proof of work: What Will you use, HTML, CSS, PHP, etc..: Why do you want this job?: Msn:
Coder
Age Name: Experience: Proof of it: Why do you want to work: Msn:
Gfx
Name: Age: Proof of work: Experience: Msn:
Official video maker
Name: Age: Proof of work: Experience: Msn:
Official Advertiser

item.title: Pk Server/Stable/Domain/Needs one more coder/gfx to help us
item.dc:creator: @angelfallen angelfallen
item.description:
@angelfallen wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:14, topic:402220”]Applying for:
I am applying for the position of Head Administrator/Administrator

Age
22 years of age. (3/1/1989)

Name:
Jordan Patterson

Experience:
I have received 2 credits for Business & Management, 3 credits for Psychological thinking, and 1 credit for Accounting provided by the University of Argosy
I have owned and operated two large scale server, (100+ players online)
I have coded, and fully developed the two servers
I have been staff on numerous servers, both large and small, the most recent being SilabGarza (IGN: Im Teh Noob)

Why do you want to work:
First let me start off with this, I dearly love this server. This is probably one of the best servers I have played in a long, long tine. My articulation skills are very well shown, even when I don’t try. I do my best to make myself look very formal, and appropriate when players are near, or even far. I am very friendly, allowing players to be able to talk to me. I have been through many things throughout my life, allowing players to relate with me easily. I have a vast knowledge of all RuneScape effects, from Items to Mini-games. I get along with other staff members easily. I am able to post well made guides, easily and quickly. I have a vast coding knowledge, and would like to help with that as much as I can. I am very active and very helpful to all players, as well as staff members. I like to think that I have a go-getter attitude, even though that sounds really kinda cheesy. Very Happy I’m a Beta Tester, so I am able to help find bugs and glitches. I want to help the owners of the server out in everything that they do. I would greatly appreciate it if I was allowed to join this Development Team.

Msn:
revealedx@live.com[/quote]

accepted

also can you guys stop fighting ^^^^ if you keep this up ill have to report to a mod.

Read full topic
